decision_conditions: The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
The two Cypress trees within the rear garden on 10 Tanworth Close form part of a row within the
rear gardens of properties 1 to 10. They form a screen between properties in Tanworth Close and
the flats to the rear. As a collective they have a Moderate amenity value and contribute to the
arboreal character of the local area.
This application is the second recent submission to remove these trees, the previous application
62067/TRE/2023/74 was refused (see previous decision notice for more information) but briefly due
to conflicting information in the application and setting an undesirable precedence for the removal of
The applicant has taken into account the reasons for our previous refusal when submitting this
application and has only provided supporting documentations that correlate with the wish to remove
these cypress'. However it is still our belief that these two Cypress trees provide a positive
contribution to the local area especially when viewed from the car
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: To fell Two Leyland Cypress in G1 within TPO 257 (shown as T1 and T2 on map)
